column1: The Pit Room////The brisket is tender and has a beautiful bark! It fares better than Roegels
column2: but still not the winner of best brisket in Houston. The pork ribs are pretty great
column3: but what stole the show as the venison sausage! It's got a super strong pepper and garlic flavor
column4: and it tastes AMAZING with the coffee bourbon sauce.
